alert.note: Alert for Antrim; Otsego (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 11:41AM EDT by NWS Gaylord
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Otsego and east central Antrim Counties through 1245 PM EDT... At 1141 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Alba, or near Mancelona, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Elmira and Alba around 1155 AM EDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Gaylord, Otsego Lake State Park and Waters. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
